body:
Hi Ignacio,


3dsmax2mesh converter? what is this?


-Jack


Ignacio Munarriz wrote:
> Hi all, i'm enjoying wit a 3dsmax2mesh converter, but i've got some 
> problems in the second stage (first stage vertexs, second stage 
> normals), i've got obj2mesh as reference and using cvtri function to 
> create the mesh faces , but an artifact has appeared in the contour 
> line between light and shadow in some objects like spheres as in 
> www.aisarquitectura.com/img/sphere.jpg , i think i've seen something 
> similar before in radiance docs or list, but now i dont remember 
> where, any help?
>
>
